review:
He is our family doctor since 2007. He is very polite and friendly. He prescribes mild with less side effect medicines only according to the patients' health. He can be contacted/online consultation through WhatsApp at any time.  He recommends lab test only if it is really necessary.  He treats the patient as his family member. 
I recommend his to all my known people.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sujeer is very cordial with the patient.He tries to go into bottom of the cause of disease.He explains reason for different tests as required.His work culture is quite admirable.He is a very cool doctor.
He is very polite. He also called me back and enquired when I had called him once. I had taken my Son to him for calf muscle pain. Minimum medicine and quick recovery. This happened last November.
